languages.text: "Будет исполнено, Лорд-капитан. Я прослежу, чтобы он не выходил из забытья, а его опасные силы оставались в узде. Что касается культа, уверен, он распадется, лишившись своего духовного отца".

"It will be done, Lord Captain. I will see to it that he remains unconscious and his dangerous powers are kept in check. As for the cult, I am sure it will dissolve on its own without its spiritual leader."
languages.original_text: "Будет исполнено, Лорд-капитан. Я прослежу, чтобы он не выходил из забытья, а его опасные силы оставались в узде. Что касается культа, уверен, он распадется, лишившись своего духовного отца".

traits.locale_text: "It will be done, Lord Captain. I will see to it that he remains unconscious and his dangerous powers are kept in check. As for the cult, I am sure it will dissolve on its own without its spiritual leader."
"It shall be done, Lord Captain. I will see to it that he remains unconscious and his dangerous powers are kept in check."

languages.text: «Así se hará, Lord Capitán. Me ocuparé de que quede inconsciente y sus peligrosos poderes estén contenidos. En cuanto al culto, sin su líder espiritual no tardará en disolverse».
languages.original_text: "It will be done, Lord Captain. I will see to it that he remains unconscious and his dangerous powers are kept in check. As for the cult, I am sure it will dissolve on its own without its spiritual leader."

traits.locale_text: «Así se hará, Lord Capitán. Me ocuparé de que quede inconsciente y sus peligrosos poderes estén contenidos. En cuanto al culto, sin su líder espiritual no tardará en disolverse».

languages.text: 「お任せください、ロード・キャプテン。彼が意識を取り戻さないよう、そしてその危険な力が制御された状態であり続けるよう、注意しておきましょう。カルト教団については、精神的指導者がいなくなれば、自然と解散することでしょう」
languages.original_text: "It will be done, Lord Captain. I will see to it that he remains unconscious and his dangerous powers are kept in check. As for the cult, I am sure it will dissolve on its own without its spiritual leader."

traits.locale_text: 「お任せください、ロード・キャプテン。彼が意識を取り戻さないよう、そしてその危険な力が制御された状態であり続けるよう、注意しておきましょう。カルト教団については、精神的指導者がいなくなれば、自然と解散することでしょう」

languages.text: “遵命，舰长大人。我会亲自确保他全程处于昏迷状态，遏制住他危险的力量。至于那个教派，那些教徒失去了精神领袖，我相信他们会自行解散。”
languages.original_text: "It will be done, Lord Captain. I will see to it that he remains unconscious and his dangerous powers are kept in check. As for the cult, I am sure it will dissolve on its own without its spiritual leader."

traits.locale_text: “遵命，舰长大人。我会亲自确保他全程处于昏迷状态，遏制住他危险的力量。至于那个教派，那些教徒失去了精神领袖，我相信他们会自行解散。”

languages.text: "Wie Ihr wünscht, Lord Captain. Ich werde sicherstellen, dass er bewusstlos bleibt und seine gefährlichen Kräfte nicht außer Kontrolle geraten. Was den Kult angeht, bin ich sicher, er wird sich ohne seinen spirituellen Anführer selbst auflösen."
languages.original_text: "It will be done, Lord Captain. I will see to it that he remains unconscious and his dangerous powers are kept in check. As for the cult, I am sure it will dissolve on its own without its spiritual leader."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr wünscht, Lord Captain. Ich werde sicherstellen, dass er bewusstlos bleibt und seine gefährlichen Kräfte nicht außer Kontrolle geraten. Was den Kult angeht, bin ich sicher, er wird sich ohne seinen spirituellen Anführer selbst auflösen."

languages.text: « Entendu, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je ferai en sorte qu'il demeure inconscient et que ses pouvoirs soient maîtrisés. Quant au culte, je parie qu'il disparaîtra de lui-même une fois privé de son guide spirituel. »
languages.original_text: "It will be done, Lord Captain. I will see to it that he remains unconscious and his dangerous powers are kept in check. As for the cult, I am sure it will dissolve on its own without its spiritual leader."

traits.locale_text: « Entendu, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je ferai en sorte qu'il demeure inconscient et que ses pouvoirs soient maîtrisés. Quant au culte, je parie qu'il disparaîtra de lui-même une fois privé de son guide spirituel. »

languages.text: "Başüstüne Lord Kaptan. Bilincinin kapalı olduğundan ve tehlikeli güçlerinin kontrol altında tutulduğundan emin olacağım. Tarikata gelirsek ruhani liderleri gidince kendi kendine dağılacağından eminim."
languages.original_text: "It will be done, Lord Captain. I will see to it that he remains unconscious and his dangerous powers are kept in check. As for the cult, I am sure it will dissolve on its own without its spiritual leader."
